andromeda.why: Claim self-care before service—sovereign giving, not appeasement.

arcturus.why: Set capacity and boundaries first; clean container for care.

draco.why: Early 'who deserves care' policing can creep in.

orion-dark.why: Rule-bound charity used to force compliance.

orion-light.why: Discipline to say no until resourced.

pleiades.why: Nourishing impulse present—attune gently to real need.

sirius.why: Private caretaking calibration; no transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Define who cares for what and when; right-sized scope.

draco.why: Guardian stance at thresholds protecting dependents.

lyra.why: Gracious delivery improves uptake of help.

orion-dark.why: Duty can drift into coercive compliance.

sirius.why: Relational service, not codified instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Victim–savior loops outsource agency in caretaking.

arcturus.why: Over/under-giving exposes weak limits and messy placement.

orion-dark.why: Moralizing care becomes obedience testing and leverage.

orion-light.why: Hard lessons teach right-sized, principled giving.

andromeda.why: Ends enabling; frees recipients to stand on their own.

arcturus.why: Builds fair intake/triage and pacing for support.

draco.why: Protects vulnerable access; checks predatory claims.

lyra.why: Welcoming tone makes care receivable without vanity.

orion-dark.why: Policies can ossify into control if over-fixed.

sirius.why: Teaches care protocol by example—intake, rationing, boundaries.

andromeda.why: Uses authority to end coercive care loops and dependency.

arcturus.why: Sets standards, roles, and cadence for nourishment systems.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to care ethics and fair access.

lyra.why: Designs dignified, welcoming environments for receiving.

orion-dark.why: Standard-setting can slip into moral control or optics.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when scarcity or pressure bite.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports adoption without enmeshment.

sirius.why: Instruction in ethics-of-care and provisioning law.

andromeda.why: Embodied benevolence grants sovereignty to recipients.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for humane feeding/care.

draco.why: Presence can feel like a gate to support.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing care risks paternalism and dogma.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to balance mercy with firm limits.

sirius.why: Royal instruction of the care canon—presence teaches law-by-hospitality.
